item.description:
Let's meet for Margarita's and Mexican food at Jalapeno's in Gloucester to celebrate Cinco de Mayo!


5.4.10 UPDATE: We have called in the reservation to the restaurant the only change is the time that we are meeting is now 6:15, the reservation is under Vicki/Meetup group if you are able to get there a little earlier that would be great. If you are not able to make the new time please update your RSVP.

Jalapenos is Gloucester's only authentic Mexican Restaurant. Established in 1992 they take pride in serving only genuine Mexican recipes brought here by their staff from Mexico City, central and southern Mexico. All of the dishes are meticulously prepared using only the freshest possible ingredients
item.name: Cinco de Mayo
